frontmatter.name: taiwan-invoice
frontmatter.description: Taiwan E-Invoice API integration specialist for ECPay, SmilePay, and Amego. Provides B2C/B2B invoice issuance, void, allowance, query, and print functionality. Includes encryption implementations (AES-128-CBC, MD5), tax calculations, and complete API specifications.

title: Taiwan E-Invoice Skill
description: Comprehensive guide for Taiwan E-Invoice API integration. Supports ECPay, SmilePay, and Amego providers with B2C/B2B invoice operations.
